channel.title: WrathScapeV2 | Good eco | Growing community | Awesome staff | Uptime 24/7 |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/40f00f6df191f5e9e8e748cc7f25ab6c.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Welcome to WrathscapeV2 release. Daily Updates, 99.9% Uptime, Coded Off Players Suggestions. Hope To See You Guys Around And Be Apart Of The Wrathscape's Community.[/size][/font][/center]
[center]Website Link: [url=http://www.wrathscape.info/]http://www.wrathscape.com/[/url][/center] [center]Fourms Link: [url=http://wrathscapev2.enjin.com/]http://wrathscapev2.enjin.com/[/url][/center] [center]Download Link: [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/nwhw90dpzjrjtiu/WrathScapeV2.jar?dl=1][/url][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=36pt]Website:[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/427efaccfbcde8dffb954c271847c510.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=36pt][font=times new roman]Features ![/font][/size][/center] [font=comic sans ms][size=24pt][color=blue][center]- Dicing - Curse prayer - Npc kill point system - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Money pouch - Clan chat + Lootshare - summoning - Working dung - 24 skills - Awesome staff - Growing community - Wrathscape Champ - Holiday Events - Uptime 24/7 - Pvm - Pvp - Eco - Bosses - Ganodermic - drygore - polypore staff - Customs - Nex - Working iron man rank ! - Custom interfaces - In game interface changer. - Home at edge. - Vote system - Daily updates - Moshpit - Funpk - Growing community ! (:
*Much more*[/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=36pt]Server Media:[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Home[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/3602246078ae204d54125d2023d6c7ce.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Shops[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/53f8f2a618630d4777969aba9d27a1d3.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Goblins At Home (Drop 1m ea)[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/ac96b2df7d27570461f637ec24b7cb49.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Custom Skilling Zone[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/d811a8671840f1ce81f5b490c15c87b8.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Donor Zone (Gnomes Drop xmas Crackers)[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/74d24bdff2f4ea40fdfbf59b2e7d5d90.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]NPC Kill Point Shop[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/e7336b1ea2eabdd34df23f904a7b6e4a.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Dungeoneering Rewards Shops[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/e4a93be6742d433f8d73dc2b659a0193.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/6cfb2467178b7bb948e777e4ff6dba85.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]100% Dungeoneering With 8 Floors[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/bcf8e06b68158470408f700bcfbd1de7.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Avatar Boss (Drops Customs)[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/1f8352d7d34705bda73d8c4780c52c41.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Nex and Champ Boss[/size][/font][/center] [center][img]http://i.gyazo.com/73180e8e7b053778d8e6438b2cca0792.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Hope to see you guys in game. If you have any questions or concerns feel free to pm staff.
Owner = Beale Co-Owner = Paul Admin's = Kee, Adrian Moderators = [Open][/size][/font][/center]

item.dc:creator: @paulvereline paulvereline
item.description:
@paulvereline wrote:

[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=18pt]Welcome to WrathscapeV2 release. Daily Updates, 99.9% Uptime, Coded Off Players Suggestions. Hope To See You Guys Around And Be Apart Of The Wrathscape’s Community.[/size][/font][/center]

[center]Website Link: http://www.wrathscape.com/[/center]
[center]Fourms Link: http://wrathscapev2.enjin.com/[/center]
[center]Download Link: [/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=36pt]Website:[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][size=36pt][font=times new roman]Features ![/font][/size][/center]
[font=comic sans ms][size=24pt][color=blue][center]- Dicing

  • Curse prayer
  • Npc kill point system
  • Donator island
  • All Tzhaar waves
  • Money pouch
  • Clan chat + Lootshare
  • summoning
  • Working dung
  • 24 skills
  • Awesome staff
  • Growing community
  • Wrathscape Champ
  • Holiday Events
  • Uptime 24/7
  • Pvm
  • Pvp
  • Eco
  • Bosses
  • Ganodermic
  • drygore
  • polypore staff
  • Customs
  • Nex
  • Working iron man rank !
  • Custom interfaces
  • In game interface changer.
  • Home at edge.
  • Vote system
  • Daily updates
  • Moshpit
  • Funpk
  • Growing community ! (:

Much more[/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=36pt]Server Media:[/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Home[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Shops[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Goblins At Home (Drop 1m ea)[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Custom Skilling Zone[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Donor Zone (Gnomes Drop xmas Crackers)[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]NPC Kill Point Shop[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Dungeoneering Rewards Shops[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]100% Dungeoneering With 8 Floors[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Avatar Boss (Drops Customs)[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Nex and Champ Boss[/size][/font][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][font=times new roman][size=14pt]Hope to see you guys in game. If you have any questions or concerns feel free to pm staff.
